channel.title: [Need Help] Adding items to npc shops! [RSPS]
channel.description:
[b][size=15pt]Hey everyone,[/size]
I got a problem and i would really like if you could help me with it!
I would like to add or edit items in a npc shop: (Example) [url=http://gyazo.com/4c205c07192d7f7d122b90844dead065]http://gyazo.com/4c205c07192d7f7d122b90844dead065[/url]
So i started searching on where i could edit the items in the shops and found this : [url=http://gyazo.com/b641724138b53a98a994fc0204971f5e]http://gyazo.com/b641724138b53a98a994fc0204971f5e[/url]
I thought i found it so i added some ID's and Quantitys to some shops, compiled and reran the server but without any changes...
Does somone have an idea on how to change it? i've searched everywhere before i came here to make this thread. So i really need help!
Thanks allot![/b]

item.title: [Need Help] Adding items to npc shops! [RSPS]
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

Make sure you put 2 2 in front of every item in your store, after the description.
Make sure you use TAB and not SPACE, this is important.

You can edit prices in prices.txt.

Read full topic
item.source: [Need Help] Adding items to npc shops! [RSPS]

item.title: [Need Help] Adding items to npc shops! [RSPS]
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

data/cfg/shops.cfg

Format should be shop = Shop_ID Shop_Name Sell Buy Item_ID Amount

Read full topic
item.source: [Need Help] Adding items to npc shops! [RSPS]
